p: All the materials were used without further purification. Caffeine (99%) and cyanamide (98%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Kuraray was purchased from MTI. Hydrochloric acid was purchased from Merck. ZnCl 2 was purchased from Alfa Aesar, and NaCl was purchased from Fischer Chemicals. 1-Methyl-2-pyrrolidinone 99% (NMP) was purchased from Alfa Aesar and polyvinylidene difluoride (PVDF) was purchased from MPI Corporation.
